full_summary:
*******
# Tender Announcement
*******
#### Title: 5000070606 - Bang the Table e-Consultation Software

**Reference:** PW-23-01020493

**Notice Type:** Advance Contract Award Notice

The Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission (CNSC) has a requirement for a software solution to support the operation of an online consultation platform. The platform must be capable of hosting multiple, large-scale, and technically complex consultations simultaneously. The system should also provide detailed reporting capabilities and adhere to the Government of Canada's accessibility standards.

#### Key Requirements
* The proposed solution must support a minimum of 500 concurrent users.
* The system should be able to handle large, high-resolution visual aids, including documents, images, and videos.
* Detailed reporting capabilities must be provided to facilitate an efficient and effective consultation process.
* The proposed solution must meet or exceed the Government of Canada's accessibility standards.

#### Tender Details
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-23T13:00:00
* **Notice Date:** 2023-01-09
* **Contracting Entity:** Canadian Nuclear Safety Commission
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Email: solicitation-demandedesoumission@cnsc-ccsn.gc.ca
	+ PDF Document: [5000070606 - ACAN EN](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/09/890c02f6d6f56bc34772b848ae36259e/5000070606_-_acan_-_en.pdf)
	+ PDF Document (French): [5000070606 - ACAN FR](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/09/a51b3d8e3ff719bf9008c4c68207d9f0/5000070606_-_acan_-_fr.pdf)

Note that some fields from the original text were excluded (e.g. GSN, UNSPC, procurement category) since they were deemed not relevant or contextually insignificant. The rewritten text focuses on the main aspects of the tender announcement, maintaining essential details while ensuring clarity, conciseness, and professionalism.
